loan.name: Giorgi
loan.use: to continue studying agricultural science and biosystems engineering at the university.
loan.description:
Giorgi, 20, is a determined student enrolled in the faculty of agricultural science and biosystems engineering at the university. Passionate about sustainable agriculture and environmental conservation, he is dedicated to learning about innovative methods to enhance food production while minimizing ecological impact.

Seeking financial assistance through a student loan, Giorgi aims to further his education and contribute to the development of agricultural practices that prioritize both productivity and environmental stewardship.
loan.whySpecial: It allows low-income students to pursue education and find jobs before repaying.
